Based on a promotion with clickbank, I was supposed to get $500 in ads credits and it was not applied to my account. How do I get the ads credits?

Hi Jay, I'm sorry to hear that your ad credits were not applied to your account. To resolve this issue, please follow these steps:
1. Ensure you have created an account on admanager.newsbreak.com.
2. Access the Billing Section.
3. Under Ad Credits, click on â€˜Add ad credits.'
4. Choose â€˜Customizeâ€™ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit, plus at least $1. For example, if your gifted ad credit is $500, your total should be a minimum of $501 or more.
5. Enter the promotional code provided by ClickBank.
6. Provide credit card information and check out.
If you still face issues, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.
